Consent

In order to process this request for a Labour Electronic Access Forms (LEAF) Online Service account, the Department of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC), will need to validate the following information about the identity of your organization as part of the registration process:

  • Legal Organization Name
  • Business Number
  • Mailing Address
  • Payroll Account Status
  • Date Payroll Account Created

ESDC is collaborating with the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) to obtain the above-mentioned information for this. In order for ESDC to obtain this information from the CRA, the CRA requires consent from a Business Owner.

Once confirmed that you are a Business Owner, carefully read the options below and indicate whether or not you agree to have the CRA disclose your organization's information to ESDC. Information will only be used for the purpose of validating your organization's identity during the LEAF account registration process. The CRA may follow-up during a review process to ensure that you are indeed a Business Owner associated with this organization.

As a Business Owner, if you agree that the CRA may disclose the above organization information to ESDC, then select the button "Yes, I consent to the CRA disclosing my organization's information to officials within ESDC in order to validate my organization's identity for the purposes of the LEAF account registration process." By clicking on this option, you are providing your consent for the CRA to disclose the stated information about your organization to officials within ESDC. Once your information is validated, you will be able to use the LEAF online service to complete and submit items to the Labour Program.

As a Business Owner, if you do not agree to have the CRA disclose your organization information to ESDC for the purposes of validating your organization's identity during the LEAF account registration process, then select the option "No, I do not consent to the CRA disclosing my organization's information to officials within ESDC." By clicking on this option, you are not providing your consent for the CRA to disclose the stated information about your organization to officials within ESDC. You will not be able to use the LEAF online service but you can continue to submit Employer's Annual Hazardous Occurrence Report (EAHOR) through your established method or until such time as you do provide consent.

Yes, I consent to the CRA disclosing my organization's information to officials within ESDC in order to validate my organization's identity for the purposes of the LEAF account registration process. No, I do not consent to the CRA disclosing my organization's information to officials within ESDC.

Screen Identifier:
ORG-2002
